text.text_translated:
In the past, many bridges were made of wood.
Wood bridges could catch fire very easily.
This was especially a problem for old train bridges.
A train's steel wheels made sparks on the steel tracks.
These sparks could set the wood bridge on fire.
Then the whole bridge could burn down.

best_attempt.text_translated:
In the past, many bridges were made of wood.
These bridges burned very easily.
This was a big problem for old train bridges.
A train's steel wheels on steel tracks sometimes made sparks.
These sparks could start a fire on the wood bridge.
Then the whole bridge could burn down.
